data.description:
Immerse yourself in the meditative and tranquil worlds of our THZZLS, where time slows down. Journey into past centuries to explore historical cultural artifacts.

DER BAZAR
Step into the enchanting world of "DER BAZAR", an extraordinary VR paper theatre. Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of old-fashioned rooms as you carefully arrange furniture and props according to vintage pictures. Each room is meticulously designed to capture the essence of 19th century Germany, showcasing authentic objects sourced from the renowned German lifestyle magazine "DER BAZAR", which was published in the vibrant city of Berlin.

DIE FISCHE
Next up, let us introduce you to "DIE FISCHE". Step into a realm of mesmerising beauty as you discover an exquisite collection of illustrations featuring majestic fish from the 18th-century. Engage with them in an interactive and immersive experience that will surely leave you delighted.

DIE SCHMETTERLINGE
Have you always wanted to catch some butterflies? Well, here's your opportunity! In this level you will be transported into nature and surrounded by butterflies. Your task is to catch these exquisite creatures and place them into their corresponding silhouettes to witness a magical transformation. Each butterfly featured in the game is a stunning original 19th-century illustration, enhancing the beauty of the experience.

The best part? You don't need any controllers to navigate these remarkable worlds. Your own hands will serve as your guide.
